Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Blackman, Appellant, v. Myers.
Submitted November 13, 1967.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Robert Blackman, appellant, in propria persona.
Alan J. Davis, Assistant District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for appellee.
March 15, 1968:
